channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: @trekonomics Amazon “search inside” and Google book search are handy ways for turning an ebook quote into a page number.
@trekonomics His voters don’t dwell on small details.
@prof_dainy With room to stash a kitten!

Solution is obvious: The government should seize the building and all the funds from the owners, as well as whatever charities they might have donated to, and use it to continue to provide nursing care for the residents. https://t.co/fIy5fz0coQ
Your occasional reminder that the people who didn’t trust secular government to provide welfare services to people happily shovel government funds to theocratic scum. https://t.co/fIy5fz0coQ

Are there any surveys (besides the Nishma ones cited below) that ask: Why are you not …engaged in Jewish life …synagogue member …member of the denomination you grew up in. …etc. ? https://t.co/TZpXsoLStO
@DBashIdeas @YehudisFletcher @Anzovina This is the only survey I recall which included an “exit interview.” It shouldn’t only be the Orthodox community asking this question.
@lavietidhar Really, really negligible beyond the obvious Hebrew and English cognates. But I know people....
@lavietidhar What's the point of having a pet one-legged cow if you can't milk it for your author bio?
@trekonomics My grandfather was an economist. He saw the war in the Pacific coming. He stocked up on pineapple juice. He neglected to stock up on automobile tires, to his later chagrin.
@AkivaMCohen May I ask why?
@MarcusMarsden @Matt_Stike Those two should have been double albums.

@thatbrian @C_Stroop Read the Book. Forgive loans every seven years. Criminalize wage theft. Ban predatory interest rates. Stop federal funds encouraging people to eat shrimp and other “abominations.”
@ariella_kay No more than Maimonides was.
Looking back on my life, my one true regret is the time and mental energy spent giving Republican arguments a fair hearing. https://t.co/lrydZhNxhl
@scalzi @AudioFileMag So close to having Dolly Parton reading your novel!
@BritishPodcast Significantly different than a 19th century Manhattan horse?
@Eodyne1 @EricJRyanLaw @STEMthebleeding @AkivaMCohen So this is one judge ruling on the motion for a case that will be heard by the full panel?
@prof_dainy Noted and forwarded to the party responsible!
@bernstein_judah Cf the Empire State.
@typolad @datadivajf My old Rosh Yeshiva would like a word with you.

@HeerJeet Really good evidence for @matthewstoller’s theory that monopoly is destroying everything.
@HeerJeet @matthewstoller Some Amazon bean counter decided it wasn’t worth spending a trivial amount of money maintaining a rather basic technology stack once they decided to redirect to https://t.co/Zke9wlDkOW.
@datadivajf It’s possible that those styles only lasted the same few years on Vulcan that Beehives lasted on 20th century Earth and later 23rd century Starfleet.

@CaitlinWolper Why not? Regina is a known quantity. The new album is either a radical departure (unlikely) or continued growth and evolution (more likely) or just a dismal disappointment (also unlikely) but it’s a story nonetheless.
